bagged.advancement.baby_backpack.title: Goody Bag
bagged.advancement.ender_pouch.title: Ender Access
bagged.advancement.ender_pouch.descripti: Sticking your hand inside this bag makes it appear inside your Enderchest...
bagged.advancement.frayed_backpack.title: Backpack Beginnings
bagged.advancement.frayed_backpack.descr: It's not much, but it's mine! Craft a Frayed Backpack to expand your inventory space.
bagged.advancement.plated_backpack.title: Leveling Up
bagged.advancement.plated_backpack.descr: Surround your Frayed Backpack with Iron Ingots to expand its storage capabilities.
bagged.advancement.gilded_backpack.title: Gilded Expansions
bagged.advancement.gilded_backpack.descr: Enhance your Plated Backpack by plating it with gold. Shiny!
bagged.advancement.bejeweled_backpack.de: Stick some rare gems on your Gilded Backpack to make it even shinier!
bagged.advancement.blazing_backpack.desc: Plate your backpack with Netherite to make it immune to fire & lava.
bagged.advancement.withered_backpack.des: Enhance your shiny backpack with a trophy obtained by the desolate king.
bagged.advancement.endless_backpack.desc: Obtain the ultimate backpack, fueled by the power of The End.
